title: WeakMap
description: The `WeakMap` JS object is a collection of key-value pairs where keys are objects and values can be any data type, with keys being weakly held to support garbage collection.
content: The object that holds a collection of key-value pairs where keys are objects and values can be any value. The keys are weakly held, meaning if there are no other references to a key object, it can be garbage collected. This avoids memory leaks.
